'''''Mallorn'' 39''' is the thirty-ninth issue of the [[The Tolkien Society]]'s  journal ''[[Mallorn (journal)|Mallorn]]'', published in September [[2001]].

==Contents==
* Cover Art
** By: [[Pauline Baynes]]
* Editorial
** By: Len Sanford
* Legendary and historical time in ''[[The Lord of the Rings]]''
** By: Allan Turner
* Fiction: Ytenelinga Saga
** By: Lynn Forest-Hill
* Coming of Age: changes of heart
** By: Christine Davidson
* Alternative history: An orc's-eye view
** By: [[John Ellison]]
* Icons of Jesus Christ in ''[[The Lord of the Rings]]''
** By: Jean Chausse
* [[The Shire]]: its bounds, food and farming
** By: William Sarjeant
* A symposium: Tolkien - why is he important today
** By: Valerie Anand, Dale Nelson
* Letters
* Artwork
** By: Geof Jordan, Lynn Forest-Hill, Lorenzo Daniele, [[John Ellison]], Emma Clifford, [[Kay Woollard]]
